movies.title: When You Call Me That, Smile
movies.plot: A man leaves his quiet life in the country to become a comic entertainer in the Big City. His journey is a Surreal celebration of the descent into a Hell of narcissistic self-destruction. In a string of events ranging from antisocial transgression to racist provocation to fantastic flights of absurdity, our protagonist loses grasp of his humanity and bit by bit slips into complete animal degradation. A comedy.
movies.simplePlot: A man leaves his quiet life in the country to become a comic entertainer in the Big City. His journey is a Surreal celebration of the descent into a Hell of narcissistic self-destruction. ...

biography.bio: Sam Bremen is an actor, known for You Are Your Body/You Are Not Your Body (2014), When You Call Me That, Smile (2014) and The Complete History of Seattle (2015).
biography.name: Sam Bremen

biography.bio: Sayo Em is an actor, known for When You Call Me That, Smile (2014).
biography.name: Sayo Em

biography.bio: Ariel Greenspoon is an actor, known for When You Call Me That, Smile (2014).
biography.name: Ariel Greenspoon

biography.bio: Matt Latham is an editor and cinematographer, known for Untitled Adam Green Project (2017), You Are Your Body/You Are Not Your Body (2014) and It Felt Good to Have This Pain (2012).
biography.name: Matt Latham

biography.bio: G-Su Paek is an actor, known for Somebody Up There Likes Me (2012), 7 Chinese Brothers (2015) and Call Me Brother (2017).
biography.name: G-Su Paek

biography.bio: Christina Parrish is an actress and writer, known for This Is Art Baby (2016), Call Me Brother (2017) and Thanks for Having Us (2015).
biography.name: Christina Parrish

biography.bio: Nick Toti is an actor and producer, known for When You Call Me That, Smile (2014), The Complete History of Seattle (2015) and You Are Your Body/You Are Not Your Body (2014).
biography.name: Nick Toti

biography.bio: Aaron Walther is an actor and producer, known for Fun with Hackley: Axe Murderer (2016), Last Girl Standing (2015) and Abogado Avocado Law Firm Commercial (2013).
biography.name: Aaron Walther

biography.bio: Sway Youngston is an actor, known for When You Call Me That, Smile (2014).
biography.name: Sway Youngston
